chain_valid.description: True if the hash chain is fully intact up to the latest entry.

divergence_point.description: The first sequence number or digest where a mismatch was detected.

latest_entry_digest.description: The digest of the most recent valid entry.

entry_count.description: Total number of log entries for this trace.

last_seq.description: Final sequence number in the log.

missing_seq_ranges.description: Gaps detected in the sequence numbers.

re_dispatch_required.description: Derived from recommended_action. True if client should resubmit.
